description:
• Over 3500 happy students enrolled in my courses
  • Currently 103 out of 124 4- and 5-star reviews
  • No risk involved. Watch the PREVIEW VIDEOS!


Success is a game - a game with unique rules, laws, principles, and strategies.

This course teaches you how to win that game - in a VERY unique way...

Like a coach, I use simple graphics, hand-drawn images, and pictures to visually breakdown these rules, laws, principles, and strategies - to show you the mechanics of how they work - then when you fully and deeply grasp how they work, I teach you specific ways to use them to play the game of success like a champion!

I'm sure you're going to love this unique way of learning and growing into a more awesome human being.

So...what makes this one of the best success courses you will ever take?

  • My relentless focus on delivering high-quality content within the course
  • The high value of the ideas
  • The unique and engaging way lessons are presented
  • How practical and usable the ideas are that I teach you
  • The transformation you'll see in yourself
  • The transformation others will see in you

This course is for you if you:

  • Want to be to be a freakish force of success!
  • Have very little time to watch boring, complicated lessons because the kids need fed, the dog needs walked, and life just continues to happen
  • Tired of ideas that are really nothing more then weak, boring cliche's that are largely worthless nonsense ('be yourself', 'never walk away from fear', 'let it go', etc.)
  • Enjoy video training over book-learnin'
  • Want actionable, practical strategies and tools that you can use right now - today
  • Think visual explanations are the bomb!
  • Like having some fun while you learn

Scan the lessons below, and be sure to watch some of the many FREE preview videos to see for yourself that what I just said is true!

After you're done watching the free preview videos (and your brain has adjusted to how awesome it feels), then follow these steps:

  1. Join the course
  2. Watch all the videos
  3. Put what you learn into action
  4. Come back and let me know what you think - if you like what you've learned, leave a lovely (that means nice) review, if not, get a lovely refund (you have a full 30 days to do this)

Be amazing!

Derek
title: Success: How To Take Your Life From Good To Great To Amazing
